DataSourcePortable.Name: Consulta Apontamentos Pendentes
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT COUNT(*) AS QUANTIDADE FROM PR_ORDEMPRODUCAOAPONTAMENTOS
WHERE STATUS IN( 1,3)
AND ORDEMPRODUCAO IN (SELECT HANDLE FROM PR_ORDENSPRODUCAO A
WHERE (A.EMPRESA = @EMPRESA) AND (A.FILIAL = @FILIAL) AND STATUS IN (2,4) )" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="QUANTIDADE" From="A" Path="QUANTIDADE" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
